head.title: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: Sequence expressions

meta.name: title
meta.content: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: Sequence expressions

body.p: The expression E1 , E2 returns the sequence obtained by concatenating the sequences E1 and E2.
For example, $x = ("London", "Paris", "Tokyo") returns true if the value of $x is one of the strings listed.
